name: Eat Trash (KiriuOzoru)
description:
"Eat Trash" is a short platformer game. Play as a little possum as you collect some juicy trash.

This is my first published game so please be kind c: 

Made with Unity.

Controls:

Use your mouse to press the Start button in the beggining of the game.

You can use the arrows keys or asdw to move around...!

Press space to Jump.

The Game:

Collect the fruit in each level by jumping into it. Then get to the trash can, where it acts as a key, and finally get inside the trash can as possums do, and press the Up Key to go to the next Level c:
